title: (x) Boniva's logotype - similar to Hermes, Ulissa {Mike Y}
content:
Hey, does anyone recognize the font Boniva uses? Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202113527im_/http:/typophile.com/files/osteo_boniva_logo_6683.gif)
author: maggierc

comments.content:
It's probably custom, just because trademarks usually are, but [Hermes](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202113527/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/hermes/) is close, and [Ulissa](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202113527/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/ulissa/) is close if you change the dot to square.

- Mike Yanega
